entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who has been mentioned by Harry before. He is described as having a high-pitched voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who called out to Dobby, thinking he was someone he knew.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is sitting in his seat and looking around with interest.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also sitting in her seat and looking around with interest.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley looks around with interest when the elf speaks.

relationships.description: Harry knows Dobby from previous interactions.
The elf also knows Dobby, as she says 'But I knows Dobby too, sir!'
Harry mistook the elf for someone he knew.
Ron's relationship with Dobby is not specified in this context.
Hermione's relationship with Dobby is not specified in this context.
Mr. Weasley's relationship with Dobby is not specified in this context.
